knimeNode.name: Variables Looper (Start)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Start node of a variables iterator loop.

fullDescription.intro: Start node for an encapsulated sub workflow performing a loop over different variables sets. The loop body will be executed as often as there are rows in the second input table. In each iteration, it will use a different row of this parameters table (the input table #2) to assign new values to flow variables (it will use the column names as variable identifiers, that is, there will be as many new variables as there are columns in the table).

ports.dataIn: The table whose rows will constitute the variables' values, each row representing one iteration.
ports.dataOut: The unaltered input table (first input port)
